00046                 String configurationFileName = "LoggerConfigurationFile.txt";
00047

00049         Package pkg = this.getClass().getPackage();
00050         if (pkg == null)
00051         {

00053         }

synchronized void org::ipdr::collector::log::Log4JLogger::logWriteX (  String  level,
String  className,
String  function,
String  msg
)  [inline, protected]
 

The utility for outputting a single message.

Parameters:
level The level ("debug", " info", etc.).
className The class name.
function The function (method).
msg The message. 
00204     {
00205         synchronized (dateISOformat)
00206         {
00207             String classNameFull = className;
00208             if (msg == null)
00209             {
00210                 msg = "";
00211             }
00212             if (function == null)
00213             {
00214                 function = "";
00215             }
00216             if (className == null)
00217             {
00218                 className = "";
00219             }
00220 
00221             String date = dateISOformat.format(new Date());
00222             //if (true)
00223             {
00224                 if (className.startsWith(pkgPrefix))
00225                 {
00226                     className = className.substring(pkgPrefix.length());
00227                 }
00228                 // Upper-case first character of message, for consistency.
00229                 if (msg.length() > 0 && Character.isLowerCase(msg.charAt(0)))
00230                 {
00231                     msg = Character.toUpperCase(msg.charAt(0)) + msg.substring(1);
00232                 }
00233                 
00234                 String finalMsg = this.linePrefix + ":" + date + " " + // hh:mm:ss --
00235                 // leave date
00236                 // off for
00237                 // compactness
00238                 ((level != INFO_TAG && level != DEBUG_TAG) ? ("[" + level + "] ") : "") + msg + " :: " + function + "[" + className + "] ";
00239                 if (level.equals(DEBUG_TAG))
00240                 {
00241                         logger.debug(finalMsg);
00242                 }
00243                 else if (level.equals(INFO_TAG))
00244                 {
00245                         logger.debug(finalMsg);
00246                 }
00247                 else if (level.equals(WARN_TAG))
00248                 {
00249                         logger.warn(finalMsg);
00250                 }
00251                 else if (level.equals(ERROR_TAG))
00252                 {
00253                         logger.error(finalMsg);
00254                 }
00255                 else if (level.equals(FATAL_TAG))
00256                 {
00257                         logger.fatal(finalMsg);
00258                 }
00259             }
00260         }
00261     }
